videos.headline: Auburn is on the board first from Pettway's TD
videos.description: Kamryn Pettway runs up the middle and reaches for Auburn's first touchdown.

videos.headline: Auburn player carted off the field
videos.description: Darius James leaves the game on a stretcher in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Auburn Head Coach Malzahn discusses turnovers in first half
videos.description: Gus Malzahn talks about how they need to wake up and protect the football.

videos.headline: Auburn extends their lead 17-3
videos.description: Kamryn Pettway runs for 4 yards for a touchdown.

videos.headline: Mercer's Lott  battles for the INT
videos.description: Jarrett Stidham's pass is intercepted by  Kam Lott in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Mercer closes the gap with passing TD
videos.description: Kaelen Riley passes it to Marquise Irvin for a 7-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Auburn extends lead 24-10
videos.description: Kamryn Pettway fights off the defense for a 4-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Man on sideline leaves on stretcher after fall
videos.description: A man on the sideline of the Mercer-Auburn game is taken off on a stretcher after falling to the ground hard during a play.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF_ONE-PLAY (Man on sideline leaves on stretcher after fall) 2017/9/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pettway leads Auburn past Mercer
videos.description: Kamryn Pettway rushes for 128 yards and three touchdowns as No. 15 Auburn beats Mercer 24-10.
